mapper.select: SELECT IC_NUMBER, IC_TITLE, IC_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(IC_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as IC_REGDATE, IC_VIEWS, IC_OPEN_YN, IC_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=IC_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE) as CT_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_C

SELECT IC_NUMBER, IC_TITLE, IC_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(IC_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as IC_REGDATE, IC_VIEWS, IC_OPEN_YN, IC_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, (SELECT CT_NAME FROM TBL_CENTER WHERE CT_CODE=IC_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE) as CT_NAME FROM TBL_INFO_C WHERE IC_NUMBER=${seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_INFO_C(IC_NUMBER, IC_TITLE, IC_CONTENT, IC_WRITER_MEMBER_CODE, IC_REGDATE, IC_OPEN_YN) VALUES(nextval('seq_center_info'), #{title}, #{content}, 111, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{openYN})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_INFO_C SET IC_TITLE=#{title}, IC_CONTENT=#{content}, IC_OPEN_YN=#{openYN} WHERE IC_NUMBER=#{seq}
UPDATE TBL_INFO_C SET IC_VIEWS = IC_VIEWS + 1 WHERE IC_NUMBER=#{seq}
